document.masterDocTitle: Coralliophilinae (Neogastropoda: Muricidae) from the southwest Pacific

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Coralliophilinae (Neogastropoda: Muricidae) from the southwest Pacific
Mémoires du Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle

subSubSection.paragraph:
TYPE MATERIAL. —
Murex costularis
: 2 specimens (the probable holotype MHNG 1099 /60/1, 34.0 mm, and a probably non-type specimen, 1099/60/2, 26.4 mm; see Remarks, below)
. —
Coralliophila retusa
: holotype BMNH 1984094 , figured by Kosuge & Suzuki (1985: pl. 37, fig. 3) and
Higo et al . (2001: 65
, fig. G2386)
.

FIGS 1-8 . Teleoconchs of
Coralliophila s.s.
1 ,
Coralliophila violacea (Kiener, 1836)
, LIFOU 2000 stn 1418, H 20.5 mm. 2 ,
C. squamulosa (Reeve, 1846)
, LAGON stn 726, H 13.8 mm. 3 ,
C. radula
(A. Adams, 1855), CORAIL 2 stn CP 127, H 33.3 mm. 4 ,
C. bulbiformis ( Conrad, 1837 )
, CORAIL 2 stn DW 166, H 35.8 mm. 5 ,
C. costularis (Lamarck, 1816)
, LAGON stn 634, H 34.9 mm. 6 ,
C. fearnleyi ( Emerson & D’Attilio, 1965 )
, LAGON stn 561, H 34.9 mm. 7 ,
C. jeffreysi Smith, 1879
, SUVA 4 stn DW 08, H 39.3 mm. 8 ,
C. erosa (RÖding, 1798)
, CORAIL 2 stn DW 139, H 31 mm .

TYPE LOCALITY. —
M. costularis
: not designated. Locality on type box reads “Oc. Indien ”. —
C. retusa
: unknown.

EXPÉDITION
New Caledonia proper
. LAGON: stn 79, Ile Ouen-Baie du Pro- MONTROUZIER: stn 1271,
Secteur de Touho
, 20°52.7’S , ny, 22°29’S , 166°29’E ,
16 m
, 2 dd; stn 311, Grand Récif Sud, 165°19.5’E ,
5-25 m
, 1 dd; stn 1273, 20°50.4’S , 165°22.8’E , 20 22°44’S , 166°47’E ,
36 m
, 1 dd; stn 391, 22°46’S , 167°01’E ,

.

REMARKS. — The protoconch of a single juvenile was available, very corroded. Only traces of the axial threads were visible, but the general outline clearly indicates a multispiral type .
Coralliophila mira ( Cotton & Godfrey, 1932 )
from southern Australia is very similar and possibly phylogenetically related.
